channel.title: Server problems
channel.description:
so i make a server and it is all ready, used test scape......
but i invite ppl to go on my server ,they do
but when they try to go on my server thet say they have problems conecting to it,even no i can still go on it so i figure i didn`t download testscape right so i re-download it but now not even i can go on my server......... i can`t edit compile.bat or runeserver.bat because it says it says 'javac is not reconized as a internal or external command press any key to continue.... :confused: :confused:
i tried copie paysting what i was cuposet to but i guess ctrl and V counted as a key and it exited..... what happened qand how can i fix it???? PLZ HELP IT TOUK A LONG TIME TO MAKE THIS SERVER FOR NOTHING!!!

Yea the Java C error is from ClassPath you didn’t edit it in your firewall i think but 2 fix go here to learn how do “starting a private server” http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,36663.0.html
